panel.title: Shopping Suggestions
panel.no_analysis: No suggestions available at the moment. Click the refresh button to analyze your shopping needs.
panel.no_matches: No products match the current analysis criteria

setup.title: Restart Required - Shopping List with Grocy
setup.message:
Please restart Home Assistant for the Shopping List with Grocy integration to work properly.

You can restart from Settings > System > Restart or use Developer Tools > YAML.

settings.title: Restart Required - Shopping List with Grocy
settings.message:
Please restart Home Assistant for the API changes to take effect.

You can restart from Settings > System > Restart or use Developer Tools > YAML.

analysis.title: Restart Required - Shopping List with Grocy
analysis.message:
Please restart Home Assistant to apply the new analysis configuration.

You can restart from Settings > System > Restart or use Developer Tools > YAML.

suggestions.title: Grocy Shopping Suggestions
suggestions.card_hint: New shopping suggestions are available! Check them out in the [Shopping Suggestions]({url}) panel.

choice_success.title: ‚úÖ Product Selected
choice_success.message: Choice {choice_number}: {product_name} added to your shopping list!

no_choices.title: ‚ùå No Choices Available
no_choices.message: Product choices have expired. Please make a new voice search.

invalid_choice.title: ‚ùå Invalid Choice
invalid_choice.message: Choice {choice_number} is invalid. Please select between 1 and {max_choices}.

multiple_matches.title: üîç Multiple Options Found

product_created.title: New Product Created
product_created.message: Product '{product_name}' was created automatically in Grocy (ID: {product_id})

todo.product_added: Choice {choice}: {product} added to your shopping list!

voice_responses.sync_not_enabled: Bidirectional sync is not enabled yet.
voice_responses.no_choices: No choices available. Previous choices have expired, please make a new search.
voice_responses.invalid_choice: Choice {choice_number} invalid. Available choices are from 1 to {max_choices}. Please repeat your choice.
voice_responses.selection_error: Error selecting choice {choice_number}. Please try again.
voice_responses.no_product_name: I didn't understand the product name.
voice_responses.multiple_choices_detailed:
Multiple products found for {product_name} (x{quantity}). Your options are:
{choices_list}.
Say 'choice' followed by the number of your choice.
voice_responses.multiple_choices_simple: Multiple choices found for {product_name} (x{quantity}), check the app.
voice_responses.multiple_choices_voice: I found {count} choices for {product_name}: {choices_text}. Say the number of your choice, for example 'Choice 2'.
voice_responses.product_created: ‚úÖ {product_name} (x{quantity}) created and added to your shopping list!
voice_responses.product_created_notification_message: Product '{product_name}' was created automatically in Grocy (ID: {product_id})
voice_responses.no_choice_input: No voice input provided for choice.
voice_responses.invalid_voice_choice: I didn't understand '{voice_input}'. Say a number from 1 to 5, for example 'choice one' or 'number two'.
